We’re bringing the best of Berlin run crews and Späti culture together for a wonderfully weird event to celebrate the launch of the new Cloudmonster. Take a 5k run around the block to redefine road racing, of course with the fresh new colorways of the Cloudmonster on feet. Then head back to our On track in Kreuzberg to challenge your fellow run crews. After a healthy dose of movement, we’ll be throwing a party at Arena Berlin with loads of special guests and a delicious pizza pop-up.

What: 5 km run around the block followed by an after-party at Arena. (Registration for the run is closed / registration for the party is still possible!)
Where: 02:30 pm meeting point is the Späti across from Overkill - Drink Shop, Köpenicker Str. 1 / Afterparty 03:30 - Arena 
How: More info about the event and registration for the afterparty HERE.

About the Cloudmonster
The Cloudmonster is our weirdest creation yet – and it looks as weird as it feels. The good thing is, weirdness isn’t a bad thing at all. With monster-level cushioning, absurd amounts of energy return, and a playful ride, running in the Cloudmonster feels unlike ever before. In spring 2023, two brand-new Cloudmonster colorways hit the streets and we think that’s a cause for celebration. Once more, it’s time to Get Weird. Not just by yourself, but with a worldwide community of runners. Let’s Get Weird, Together.

What to expect:
On May 20, we’ll be taking over your Saturday – and a whole block of Kreuzberg. On-Running, Overkill, and the Späti across the street will host our Get Weird pop-up in honor of the Cloudmonster. Join us from 2.30 PM at the Späti across from Overkill to learn more about the new Cloudmonster styles. Then, head out for a 5k run led by KRAFT Runners, finishing near Schlesisches Tor.
Afterward, it’s challenge time. On our On track, be prepared to put your athletic prowess on display, whether that’s sprinting, catching, or even bursting balloons. Will your team come out on top?
Not a runner at heart? No worries. You can also attend the event without breaking a sweat. From 3.00 PM on, our venue at Arena Berlin opens its doors for you. There, you’ll also experience our custom-built On Track, specially designed by no other than Berlin-based artist Jeroen aka the Olifants. It’ll be wild, it’ll be weird, it’ll be fun. Expect fresh drinks, tunes by our DJs, and tasty bites, including Neapolitan pizza by TINYs. By the way, a special act – we won’t tell you who – will play a secret live show. Just for you.Keep close tabs on the social profiles of your favorite Berlin-based running crews and artists to stay up-to-date.Spots are limited. Our tip: pick up the pace and register now.
